tool_description: Parses work order details to extract required skills, location, priority level, estimated duration, and scheduling constraints for assignment processing.

work_order_id.description: Unique identifier for the work order

include_history.description: Whether to include historical assignment attempts

error_messages: Work order not found: The specified work order ID does not exist
Invalid work order status: Work order is not in an assignable state
Missing required data: Work order lacks essential information for assignment
usage: Provide a valid work order ID to extract all relevant assignment criteria. Set include_history to true for reassignments or troubleshooting.

required_skills.description: Skills needed to complete this work order
